html:
3.30.22  2:49 pm   Hi Bill, I am recently taking a break from my main hobby and finding a new one, the problem is that I am wandering aimlessly and going through every possible hobbies without making any conclusion. How do I slow myself down and choose the right hobby. Thanks :) 

      try no hobby for a few days. see if anything jumps out at you

3.30.22  2:45 pm   in the 9 8 7 music video when it says "to two 2 tue" on the bottom were you thinking about twosday (2/22/2022 on a tuesday)?

      no, i was actually thinking about tuesday 3/29/22

3.30.22  12:56 pm   i had a question like a month and a half ago or somethinf and then i forgot where it was
anyways
what if the world was a pear

      would be an interesting artpiece

3.30.22  12:24 pm   when was 9 8 7 written

      first 2 bars on dec 28, 2018. then up to the 12th bar on april 17, 2021. the rest was written the week of march 8, 2022

3.30.22  11:55 am   Why most of your songs have a "home" theme, especially "coming back home"?

      i actually have a strict rule that it's no more than 1 out of 4 songs

3.30.22  11:01 am   how do you create such great bridges in your songs

      that's easy. just find the best part in the song and then call that the bridge

3.30.22  10:30 am   Why were you shaving your piano in 2014?

      that's not actual shaving, but the reason i depicted that, like most things i do on video, is a vehicle for musical/artistic expression

3.30.22  9:12 am   The last time you wrote a counting song, you said "1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 / I'm alive". Now that it's descending, is "9 8 7" a song about dying?

      absolutely not. that song is also about being alive

3.30.22  8:08 am   when drawing, people tend to get used to how the drawing looks and therefore will notice less flaws than other people. does the same happen when making music?

      yes and it happens both positively and negatively

3.30.22  7:26 am   how can I forgive myself for something unforgivable?

      you could try some propaganda

3.30.22  6:46 am   why does your umbrella profile picture have certain colors on twitter, youtube, etc

      certainty is something i strive for in colors. it shows confidence

3.30.22  5:04 am   Are you content with the quality of your songs and videos made within the 3 week time frame? I think all recent songs have been an amazing experience

      "it's the climb"

3.30.22  4:08 am   What is your opinion on the theory that "We're living in a simulation"

      of what

3.30.22  2:48 am   will we ever find out what number makes the whole thing true?

      any number has that power. it turns out that number is you

3.30.22  2:41 am   on a scale of one to two, how good do you think you are at drawing

      1.5

3.30.22  1:58 am   Can you make another castle song

      that seems like something i would do

3.30.22  1:34 am   what was the strangest thing/object you have produced music with?

      jeans

3.30.22  1:16 am   if you have a set of things that don't match, which do you change to make it match if leaving them unmatched is distressing?

      a good first strategy can be rotation. because that is often cost free

3.30.22  12:00 am   what is your favourite sentence?

      where were we when we were where we were

3.29.22  11:27 pm   do you have a metaphor you like for describing music?

      we'll never fully know music. but music knows us

3.29.22  11:17 pm   Is there more to this world than we know? 

      yes

3.29.22  10:57 pm   what's your favorite auxiliary percussion instrument 

      the sum total that's achieved by layering and blending them tenderly

3.29.22  10:56 pm   did you know that some of your short songs are listed as being half the length that they actually are

      that's not true. they are actually supposed to repeat infinitely. the written time is the length of 1 time through the cycle. it's either that number or infinity which would be the correct length

3.29.22  10:43 pm   thoughts on meef?

      whatever gets the job done

3.29.22  10:13 pm   I get this sense that you believe in everyone as much as anyone wishes anyone would believe ik them. I believe you can make everyone believe in what they believe they can believe

      yes, that is my job

3.29.22  9:40 pm   Wow my name is Mortimer how did you guess.

      i don't believe you

3.29.22  9:21 pm   how do you explain the repetition in the end of "Mount St. Helens is about to Blow Up"

      the song is riding off into the sunset

3.29.22  9:10 pm   Heyo, I was wondering if the "meef" in 9 8 7 was improvised or written before hand? Thanks :)

      best of both worlds. improvised before hand

3.29.22  8:56 pm   is 987 a sequel to the alphabet shuffle

      not quite

3.29.22  8:55 pm   how do i learn to comprehend?

      that happens no matter what

3.29.22  8:52 pm   how are you doing

      pretty good

3.29.22  8:35 pm   Can you give me some pretty words to fight against my friends existentialism. I've always loved your abstract thought

      i don't have any techniques for fighting against friends

3.29.22  8:28 pm   favorite wonder of the world

      the earth's core

3.29.22  8:26 pm   bill my best friend just broke off with me how do i cope

      in the short term, you will be your own friend and then pretty soon you'll become someone else's friend also

3.29.22  8:18 pm   hi bill, love the new song. numbers are very cool. can you tell me something that you also think is cool? (I'm trying to collect knowledge of cool things)

      spatial coordinates

3.29.22  7:59 pm   How would you approach overcoming depression?

      make some cool goals

3.29.22  7:53 pm   If I were to bring a trombone to a daycare would that entertain the kids more than a violin?

      that's up to how you play it

3.29.22  7:53 pm   Am I correct in my speculation that the very last meef in "9 8 7" was recorded long before the song?

      absolutely not

3.29.22  7:49 pm   what's the best way to greet a new person?

      tell them your entire life story

3.29.22  7:42 pm   Is 9 8 7 tuned to A = 432? 

      absolutely not

3.29.22  7:31 pm   Out of the following concepts, which do you feel are the most common in your songs: Going home, dreams, travelling, or not knowing how to do something?

      all the categories are merged into 1 category which i've only used once and am still doing it that 1 time

3.29.22  7:26 pm   Why are you so good with everything?

      could be self defense

3.29.22  7:12 pm   i used to write songs a lot when i was in high school and loved it and thought they were pretty good. but i got disillusioned when i met people who have way more music theory knowledge, and are more accomplished at instruments/better singers than me. and now as an adult it feels too late to go back to it, and when i try to secretly write something i often end up thinking i'm just a dumbass and give up. but i really do miss it and wish i could write songs again. any advice?

      you can. just do it

3.29.22  7:08 pm   what's your second favorite brand of cereal? 

      i only know 1 brand

3.29.22  7:07 pm   is my phone number in new number song?

      probably not

3.29.22  7:04 pm   How did you come up with 9 8 7?

      i'm not sure

3.29.22  7:00 pm   so does this mean 9 8 7 is now your favorite song because it's the newest one?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.29.22  6:45 pm   Where did you learn to groove so well with such a cool hat in 9 8 7?

      at home, and in the work place

3.29.22  6:19 pm   is 9 8 7 about your past songs?

      not really
